title: Kindred
body: Can someone please gift me Kindred ;-; {{champion:203}}

replies.body: sure thing! just try and pick up on my sarcasm.
lol gift me soulstealer vayne and we are good
who wants kindred? Trash champ that can ruin the game for allies with his ulti

> [{quoted}](name=LevvyLeviticus,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=GZVE8ghn,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-01-04T04:01:58.357+0000)
>
> who wants kindred? Trash champ that can ruin the game for allies with his ulti

Kindred can be quite good in the right hands, just like any champ.
But yeah, a little weak overall.
Santa has you on the naughty list, so no.
